Content.Name: Fall 2012 PPC
Content.Title: Fall 2012 PPC
Content.BodyCopy:
The Fall 2012 PPC promises to be our largest and most widely attended yet, featuring the English, History, Political Science, and new International Studies departments. As per usual, each department will split off into its own respective section, meeting twice during the day for the conference breakfast and luncheon. To submit a student paper to present at the conference, please see the call for papers
The conference will take place on Thursday 25th October, 2012, with some speakers addressing students the day or evening before in addition to their college-wide appointments. Instructors from the College of Language & Letters have been encouraged to cancel normal classes, and instead have students attend the various conference sessions in lieu of such. Students wishing to attend sessions at times that conflict with non Language & Letters classes may request student absence forms from their instructors, department, or the college office assistants.

The tentative conference schedule is as follows (a finalized brochure and schedule will be published and featured on this website in due course); to view Speaker Profiles click here.
